line_1: My wounded Soul must still be smote,
line_2: If, Lord! thy Glory it promote,

line_1: Strong characters, and blasted where she smote,
line_2: Oft as your towers, on which dread Vengeance wrote

line_1: Where-with the GIANT he so rudely smot,
line_2: And now, disdaining parle, his courser hot
